fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 114.65 points or 0.62% to settle at 18,716.15. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.20% to 11.11. Reliance Industries (RIL), Zee Entertainment Enterprises (ZEEL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
